original_text: The land where crops had grown was now a desert. All the cities had become heaps of stones. The Lord had caused this to happen because he was very angry. The land where crops had grown was now a desert. All the cities had become heaps of stones. The Lord had caused this to happen because he was very angry. The land where crops had grown was now a desert.
korean_text: 보라 내가 본즉 좋은 땅이 황무지가 되었으며 그 모든 성읍이 여호와의 앞 그의 맹렬한 진노 앞에 무너졌으니

sentences.original_text: The land where crops had grown was now a desert.
sentences.korean_translation: 곡식이 자라던 땅은 이제 사막이 되었습니다.
